Class Unmanaged

Interface for working with unmanaged memory.

| Improve this Doc View Source

AllocMemory<T>(Int32, Boolean)

Allocate unmanaged memory. Also informs the GC of the added memory pressure. The content is zero-filled depending on the value of fillWithDefault.

Declaration
[CLSCompliant(false)]
public static T*AllocMemory<T>(int length, bool fillWithDefault = false)

    where T : struct
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 length
System.Boolean fillWithDefault

If true, fills all the buffers with default (T)
Returns
Type Description
T*
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
